body_html:
There will be RNN layers in tf.layers. They will likely look like Keras' layers, and similar to the RNNCell objects in contrib/ now.

You may also be interested in DynamicRNNEstimator in contrib/learn.

I guess the answer is that we're working on it. I will close this -- if you have a specific feature request you can open another issue.

body:
There will be RNN layers in tf.layers. They will likely look like Keras' layers, and similar to the RNNCell objects in contrib/ now.

You may also be interested in DynamicRNNEstimator in contrib/learn.

I guess the answer is that we're working on it. I will close this -- if you have a specific feature request you can open another issue.
